description: This file defines interfaces and constants for the CCSP PSM (Persistent Storage Manager) helper functions, including record CRUD operations and enumeration of instances and records.

methods.name: PSM_Set_Record_Value
methods.description: Sets a record value identified by name and type, using a PSLAP_VARIABLE.

methods.name: PSM_Get_Record_Value
methods.description: Retrieves a record value identified by name and type, returning a PSLAP_VARIABLE.

methods.name: PSM_Del_Record
methods.description: Deletes a record identified by name.

methods.name: PsmGetNextLevelInstances
methods.description: Enumerates the next level instances under a parent path, returning the number of instances and their identifiers.

methods.name: PsmEnumRecords
methods.description: Enumerates records under a parent path, providing an array of record structures.

methods.name: PSM_Set_Record_Value2
methods.description: Sets a record value identified by name and type, using a string value.

methods.name: PSM_Get_Record_Value2
methods.description: Retrieves a record value as a string, identified by name and type.

methods.name: PSM_Reset_UserChangeFlag
methods.description: Resets the user change flag for a specific record.
